ygData.subject: Haste Items

ygData.messageBody:
Elfson,
Gratz on the croaking dagger, I think that's the dagger Ihave. Supposedly it
is pretty rare. For haste item, I have a sash of dragonborne. It comes out
of Howling Stones South Tower. One decent group can get this and it's great
exp for +50's. It is a rare drop but you won't mind the wait while watching
your exp actually move!

Last night was yucky. We ported up to Air with the intentions of going to
the 4th Isle to finish the necro epic only to have IC port up on top of us.
They decided to roll to see who stayed and who left and we lost the roll!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
